income_messages:
From: m***********9@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-22 20:00:33
SUBJECT: Attention Funds Beneficiary
Attention Funds Beneficiary
I have been informed by the IMF to anticipate your message. Your pin
number has been verified and confirmed to relate to a parcel with ATM
Debit CARD valued the sum of US$2,500,000.00 {Two Million Five Hundred
Thousand US Dollars}. The ATM Debit CARD has been issued in your name
and we have concluded the processing of all documents that will
facilitate the clearance of the ATM CARD in any Bank.
These documents have been securely sealed and packed for security
reasons which make it impossible for anyone to view it until it’s been
delivered to you and also
 your parcel is protected by a hardcover
insurance policy, which makes it impossible to deduct any amount from
the money before it has been remitted to you.
Choose delivery option below that is most convenient to you iTunes
Card so after you choose the delivery option that you should buy gift
card and send it 
do not reply without the fee and make sure that you
send your full information very correct together with the fee ok
(1)FedEx Delivery Company
Duration for Delivery: 24hrs
Amount: US $50 {No C.O.D}
(2)UPS Delivery Company
Duration for Delivery 48hrs
Amount: US $75 {No C.O.D}
(3)DHL Delivery Company
Duration for Delivery 24hrs
Amount: US $150 {No C.O.D}
Contact the Company here for your Package Release to you:
Name: Mrs Mario Draghi
Send an Email to: ( 
mariodraghi09@gmail.com
 )
Kindly confirm receipt of the mail with the delivery option most
convenient to you within 24hrs. And you shall be informed on how to
make payments of the charges. 
the only way you will send the Choose
delivery option fee is Via itunes Card or Steam Wallet Card or Google
Play Gift Card
Failure to produce the delivery fee will mean refusal of ATM DEBIT
CARD delivery by the courier service so as to enable this company
secure good name they have always maintained, since the package
delivery without insurance will be illegal. Insurance is the
International law guiding the authentic delivery of diplomatic
document.
We look forward to serving you better.
Yours faithfully,
Mr. Joseph H. Belkins
ATM Center Manager
International Reconciliation and Logistics Vaults
International Monetary Fund (IMF)
From: m***********9@gmail.com
To: lx52781@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 07:46:43
SUBJECT: Re: Attention Funds Beneficiary
NOW LISTEN AND LISTEN GOOD.
    THIS IS MY LAST AND FINAL MESSAGE TO YOU BEFORE THIS FUND WOULD BE
CANCELLED AND BE TRANSFORMED TO THE MOTHERLESS BABIES HOME.
    HOW COULD YOU SEE MY MESSAGE AND IGNORE IT ALL THIS WHILE? IF YOU
DON'T HAVE THE FEE WHY CAN'T TEXT ME SO THAT I WILL KNOW WHAT TO DO
ABOUT IT.
    YOU HAVE BEEN IGNORING MY MESSAGE THINKING THAT IT'S THE BEST WAY.
    LET ME TELL YOU SOMETHING YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND ABOUT THIS FUND
DELIVERY AND I.
    I DON'T BEG PEOPLE TO RECEIVE THEIR FUND BECAUSE I KNOW THAT IT IS
REAL,THE REASON WHY I HAVE BEEN TEXTING YOU IS BECAUSE I WANTED YOU TO
FEEL THE JOY OF THIS FUND JUST LIKE THE WAY SOME THAT HAD RECEIVED
THEIR OWN FUND HAD DONE.
    I HAVE DELIVERED TO MANY PEOPLE IN OUR COUNTRY AND ALSO IN
EUROPEANS CONTINENT AND ALL OF THEM ARE LIVING SO GREAT NOW.
    DO YOU THINK THAT YOU'RE THE ONLY PERSON THAT NEEDS TO RECEIVE HIS
OR HER FUND FROM ME. I HAVE A LOT OF PEOPLE SO IF YOU'RE NOT READY TO
RECEIVE YOURS THEN KINDLY TELL ME SO THAT I CAN CANCEL YOURS AND MOVE
TO PEOPLE THAT ARE SERIOUS.
    THIS IS MY LAST WARNING AND DON'T SAY I DIDN'T INFORM YOU WHEN
THIS FUND IS CANCELLED
    THANK YOU AND I WILL BE WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU
From: m***********9@gmail.com
To: lx52781@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 08:02:13
SUBJECT: Re: Attention Funds Beneficiary
What will i do because i told you that once you do what sender told you to
do that you will received your funds which you do not complete it Why
